wikipedia_page.main: Sergeant Edward Hoare  (18 July 1890 – 8 October 1973) was a British First World War flying ace credited with seven aerial victories as an observer/air gunner.

response: * Edward Hoare (politician) (died 1765), Member of the Irish Parliament for Cork City, 1710–1713
* Sir Edward Hoare, 2nd Baronet (1745–1814), of the Hoare Baronets
* Edward Hoare (RAF airman) (1890–1973), World War I flying ace
